Product title: Tens Towels Pack of 4 Extra Large Bath Towels 30 x 60 Inches, 100% Cotton, Larger & Lighter Weight, Quicker to Dry, Super Soft and Absorbent, Perfect for Bathroom, Blue
Key Features: Light Weight and not too thick: The reduced thickness makes it more convenient to carry, allows for quick drying & is energy efficient | Larger: This package contains four generously sized bath towels, each measuring 30 x 60 inches, perfect to wrap yourself in | Designed in Super Fine Cotton to provide a softer texture and feel | Wash before first use. Wash them on their own, use mild detergent and avoid bleach & fabric softeners. Refrain from ironing | Use tumble dry on low heat. Over-drying towels can increase linting and reduce lifespan of towels. Shedding is natural on initial wash/dry cycles
comment 1: These towels are a good size and softer than I expected. They are a little on the thin side, but still feel nice and work well. Overall a solid and a good value. Will repurchase again. - Bribri
comment 2: great all around towel, absorbs well, feels good on skin, good size, good price - njp
comment 3: They are nice and large. The only drawback is that they are pretty thin for bath towels. They are fine for the cost though  and are serviceable. - Richard A.
comment 4: I love these towels so soft ad the extra 3 inches is so much nicer. Unlike bath sheets which are too big and take longer to dry, these wonderful towels go all the way around you and dry in the same amount of timr - Nancee
comment 5: These are not hotel quality towels but they are plenty good enough for my son’s extra bathroom, that use when at his house. Size is very good. Absorbs good enough. Probably needs to be washed again to be better. - Hawgfan
